title: DEALS OF THE WEEK: From free Krispy Kreme doughnuts, to 15% off Moss Bros coats
text:
Customers get can a free doughtnut on their birthday by joining a loyalty scheme

Get a free Krispy Kreme doughnut worth £1.75 on your birthday by joining its loyalty scheme. Visit website krispykreme.co.uk/friends-of-krispy-kreme.

Celebrate National Dumpling Day with a free plate of gyoza worth £4 when you eat at a Yo! restaurant between now and Thursday.

Enjoy £10 off the price of No 7 beauty products and get a free pack of mascara, lip and face cream worth £29 if you spend £50 or more at Boots today. Shoppers must visit the chemist’s online store and enter discount code ‘N07SAVE10’ before tomorrow.

Wrap up for winter with a 15 per cent discount on all coats for sale at the Moss Bros website if you can verify that you are a student at college or university.
description: This week's deals include free Krispy Kreme doughnuts, a free plate of gyoza worth £4, £10 off No 7 beauty products and much more.
authors: Towalne For The Mail On Sunday
